author: guitargeek
body:
Hi,

just got bitten by a segfault in NanoAOD which happens because a member variable of VIDNestedWPBitmapProducer is never initialized if there are no working points configured.

Okay I admit it's not really meaningful to run this producer without any working points, but I was just doing it for debugging purposes so that might happen again for other people, right?

Also, some modernizations, trailing whitespace removals and fixing indentations while glancing over this file. The actual change is the line with `unsigned int nCuts = 0;`.
title: Don't leave nCuts in VIDNestedWPBitmapProducer uninitialized
